TopicTitle: Why are my octo trusses like this, with the tank in the middle, and the visual glitch with them?

Articles.Content:
my near future construction parts have this weird bug where these tanks are in the middle, i have tried redownloading but nothing seems to work. does anyone know why?

i have ro, rss, rp1, interstellar extended and their dependencies plus a few gameplay enhancements (docking aid, persistent thrust etc.)
Any screenshots? Also I think this should be in the Near Future Technologies thread.

11 minutes ago, OrdinaryKerman said:

Any screenshots? Also I think this should be in the Near Future Technologies thread.

I did put shots in but they mustn’t have come over, it’s a bug which puts a cylinder in the middle of the truss

2 minutes ago, Fox uwu said:

I did put shots in but they mustn’t have come over, it’s a bug which puts a cylinder in the middle of the truss

I figured out the problem, it combines the visuals of every variant of that part, so I’ll probably consult the devs or re-install
So you're saying you don't have B9PartSwitch installed correctly?

yes basically, or there is something wrong with the code for realism overhaul because i was looking at its config for near future construction and says that some files need to be deleted for it to be compatible with b9ps
